response_text:
app_name: monitoring_app
description: Smart home temperature monitoring system with cloud analytics
version: 0.1.0
schemas: []
components:
  - id: sensor_collector
    type: TemperatureSensor
    capabilities: [sense, collect]
    metadata: {}
  - id: data_processor
    type: Aggregator
    capabilities: [filter, aggregate, analyze]
    metadata: {}
  - id: storage_service
    type: DataStore
    capabilities: [store, query]
    metadata: {}
links:
  - id: link_sensor_to_processor
    from: sensor_collector
    to: data_processor
    data_type: sensor_reading
    frequency: real-time
    contract: {}
  - id: link_processor_to_storage
    from: data_processor
    to: storage_service
    data_type: processed_data
    frequency: periodic
    contract: {}
policies: []
logic: {}
metadata:
  description: Smart home temperature monitoring system with cloud analytics
  version: 0.1.0
